nodes.documentation:
@title Proxy Factory - Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.
 @author Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>
nodes.name: ProxyFactory
createProxy

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.
nodes.name: proxyRuntimeCode

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.
nodes.name: proxyCreationCode
createProxyWithNonce
